attributes.action: Force all out of town centres, retail parks, fast food restaurants  to close on 26th December and 1st January
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Let shop workers enjoy some quality time over the festive period with there loved ones with out being forced to work at this time of year. These places open 364 days a year including the Easter period along with the May and august bank holidays. Most shopping centres and retail parks open in the evenings with extended opening hours at Christmas.
